channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Potholes, 9th September
item.description:
Several potholes on roundabout on A2016 Danger to two-wheel vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thamesmead, London

item.title: Debris under bridge (above waterfall) needs removing, 9th September
item.description:
Wood and rubbish is collecting at the top of the waterfall. Please can it be cleared regularly to stop this building up. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelsey Park Avenue, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead cat, 9th September
item.description:
There is literally half a cat with no insides on the corner of the road/front of my house on the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Georges Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Quad bike riding, 9th September
item.description:
I was in the park today with my dog, when all of a sudden a quad bike was racing up and down on the grass, he had no regard for anybody, he was doing wheelies and standing on the bike driving it, it was a danger to all members of the public including the infant school children that were going across the grass, this is dangerous drive-in at a top level it needs to be sorted out, and quickly, as someone or something ie dog will get hurt, someone will have to monitor the park.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eynsford Close, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wildlife area needs maintenance, 9th September
item.description:
Stone Park Avenue Entrance. Thank you for cutting the grass in front of the wild area, but the semicircle should have been in a different place. The wildflowers have now gone over and are ready for their annual cut please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Stone Park Avenue, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping near to clapton dental surgery, 9th September
item.description:
A whole load of dump next to the Council's Food Waste Bin based near Clapton Dental Surgery (near Rushmore Primary School)
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sewdley Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Tree needs water please, 9th September
item.description:
A recently planted strawberry tree, behind the Bhutan pine monolith is desperate for water. Please can it have a last soaking to give it a boost before winter. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelsey Park Avenue, Beckenham, London

item.title: Missing fence., 9th September
item.description:
As you walk down the access road from Wickham road, there is a missing section of fence., on your left hand side. Anyone can just walk into the park from the access road by the Park Langley shops, when the park is supposedly locked. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stone Park Avenue, Eden Park, London

item.title: Would it be possible for you to make some signs encouraging dog owners to clean up after their dogs?, 9th September
item.description:
Would it be possible for you to make some signs encouraging dog owners to clean up after their dogs,and to tell them not to put their dog waste in other residents dustbins? Because this has happened to me on several occasions! Last week a dog owner threw their wet dog fouling on the wall where I live! Surely this is an environmental hazard! Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet
